name: gilded alphabet set
description:
Inspired by the vintage letter blocks of our childhood, we worked with a manufacturer here in the USA to design our own exclusive Cabin 7 blocks. The light cherry wood blocks are made with sustainable wood from Michigan. You can see the natural wood grain (even some knots), which only adds to the character of these wooden blocks. We've gilded these letter blocks on the two sides where the debossed letters are inset. With each reversible block, you get two sides with the same letter (i.e., A to A). The other four sides are raw cherry wood. The blocks are gilded by hand with love. The combination of the shiny golden surface and the raw cherry wood is so beautiful. 

This gilded alphabet makes the perfect gift for any typography lover. The shiny golden letters would be a pretty addition to a wedding — spell out words on the dessert table or set the alphabet by a Photobooth for your guests to make some memorable photos. We could see the alphabet displayed in a shadow box in a child's nursery or displayed in a rad living room. 

This listing is for one complete alphabet set. You'll receive 26 reversible gilded cherry wood blocks packaged in muslin bags. The sides of the blocks measures about 1.75 inches.

Limited-edition of 5 alphabet sets. Once they go, they're gone!

*As with our entire collection, these blocks are meant for display and decoration — they're not meant to be used as toys for the kiddos.

name: gilded cardholder, petite
description:
White birch from Maine has been turned into a gilded cardholder that's truly one of a kind. We love the combination of the shiny golden surface with the natural beauty of birch logs. 

These cardholders are a petite version of the gilded cardholders in the collection — we have a mix of wide- and narrow-slot cardholders available. See descriptions of "gilded cardholder, wide slot" and "gilded cardholder, narrow slot" for further details. 

These petite cardholders measure about 2-by-3 inches. (Note: in photos here you can see these petite 2-inch gilded cardholders next to 3-inch gilded cardholders to get a sense of scale.) Each cardholder is made of white birch branches, and we've sealed and gilded the two ends.  

This listing is for ONE gilded petite cardholder. Choose between wide slot (can hold about 15 business cards) or narrow slot (can hold one photo). 

Note: the card slot itself is not gilded — it reveals the lovely raw birch wood. We've kept the natural, gorgeous beauty of the birch intact, so the birch may have peeling bark. The cardholder will stay put with the natural nubs or bumps of the bark (unless if you put in a giant piece of paper!). It's easy to find the spot where it sits upright. 

New York state residents will be charged New York state sales tax. See our shop policies for more details. Thanks!

*Cards shown in photograph by Hello!Lucky and Paper+Cup Design. Calendar page from polaroid calendar by Fieryeyed. Props shown in photographs do not come with cardholders. 

Each cardholder is gilded by hand with love.

name: LOVE set of gilded letter blocks
description:
Set of rare vintage blocks spelling out your LOVE! Vintage wood alphabet blocks have been turned into shiny gilded letters that are one of a kind.

We've gilded these vintage blocks on the two sides where the embossed letters are raised. With each reversible block, you get two different letters. Faded letters and numbers printed on other sides. We love the mix of the shiny gilded letters with the wonderfully worn vintage wood. Sweet addition to a mantel, dresser, nightstand, desk — or display above the rocker in a nursery. We could see these gilded blocks creating a lovely display at a wedding. Perfect gift for a sweetheart in your life. 

These square blocks are the largest size of vintage alphabet blocks in the collection: the sides of the blocks measure about 1.5 inches. 

Any areas of discoloration, ink markings, or minor chips are the result of years of aging — we think the little imperfections only add to the vintage charm of the blocks. Blocks may vary slightly from the exact ones shown. This listing is for four blocks spelling out the word LOVE.  

New York state residents will be charged New York state sales tax. See our shop policies for more details. Thanks!

Blocks are gilded by hand with love.

name: pick-your-own gilded letter blocks, largest size
description:
Rare vintage wood alphabet blocks have been turned into shiny gilded letters that are one of a kind. 

Display you and your love's initials in gold! We've gilded these vintage letter blocks on the two sides where the embossed letters are raised. With each reversible block, you get two different letters. Faded letters and numbers printed on other sides. We love the mix of the shiny gilded letters with the wonderfully worn vintage wood. 

Eye-catching addition to your mantel, dresser, bookcase, or desk. Perfect gift for a shower, birthday, or housewarming. We could see these gilded blocks creating a lovely display at a wedding — the possibilities are endless! 

These square blocks are the largest size of found vintage alphabet blocks in the collection: sides of blocks measure 1 5/8 inches. 

Any areas of discoloration, ink markings, or minor chips are the result of years of aging — we think the little imperfections only add to the vintage charm of the blocks. 

This listing is for ONE block. Pull down the dropdown menu to choose the letters you wish (note that each block is reversible with two different gilded letters.) 

New York state residents will be charged New York state sales tax. See our shop policies for more details. Thanks!

Blocks are gilded by hand with love.

name: vintage outlet: gilded blocks
description:
We're offering these rare, one-of-a-kind vintage letter and number blocks as a special vintage outlet sale. Each block has been gilded by hand with love. We're clearing out our inventory of vintage gilded and hand-painted gilded blocks to make room for new collections. Once we sell out of these turquoise and black painted letter blocks, we will likely not be offering them again (so get them while you can!). Each block is gilded on two sides, and like our other vintage collections, these blocks are reversible with two different letters (or numbers). 

What you see pictured is what we have in stock. Please email shopcabin7 [at] gmail [dot] com to request the blocks that you'd like. This listing is for one block from our outlet sale.

options.name: vintage outlet sale: mixed styles of gilded blocks
